name: The battle of UIER
description:
Your town is in the midst of a battle between heroes and villains; Tap your way out of falling debris, beware of the missed attack of slimer and foro as they can get in your way of dodging. Just dont panic!!!

Credits:
=====================================================
Bg music: Fight by Magic_Spark
